name: Sometimes Grey Sometimes Black Sand Simulator
name_original: Sometimes Grey Sometimes Black Sand Simulator
description:
Try to get into the house. Also walk through sand.

Programming art dialogue by Shane Torres.

Song by Shane Torres, listen here: https://soundcloud.com/shane_torres/sometimes-chairs

Icons by smachicons, flaticon, freepik, and berkahicon.

For all Mac users I'm sorry but Apple doesn't like untrusted publishers (me) so you will probably have to follow LynesExe's steps in this forum in order to give yourself permissions to run the app: https://itch.io/t/656311/i-cant-open-the-game-on-mac-os-catalina-maybe-because-i...

Thank you for playing if you did, I hope you had a good experience.
